description: This script demonstrates how to implement an Agentic Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using Hybrid Search and Reranking with specific dependencies, knowledge base setup, and agent configuration.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class representing the agent that performs knowledge retrieval and response generation.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Class for creating a knowledge base loaded with documents from URLs.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Class representing the LanceDB vector database used for storing embeddings.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for specifying the type of search (e.g., hybrid).

classes.name: CohereEmbedder
classes.description: Embedder class for generating vector representations using Cohere.

classes.name: CohereReranker
classes.description: Reranker class for reordering search results using Cohere models.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class representing the Anthropic Claude model.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response from the agent based on a query.
